content.query:
SELECt * 
 FROM [dbo.].[Insurance_premium]
 where policy_id = 1797459912


select count(*) from [dbo].[Insurance_Data]
where customer_id = 1670267934

select 
ROW_NUMBER() Over (Order by a.Customer_id) as R_No,
a.Customer_id, 
Concat(a.First_name, ' - ' , a.Last_name) as Customer_Name,
a.Address, 
a.City,
a.State,
a.Zip_Code,
a.Phone_number,
a.Gender,
b.Policy_id,
b.Policy_status,
Datediff(year,b.Policy_end_date,b.Policy_start_date) as Policy_Year,
b.Policy_start_date,
b.Policy_end_date,
b.Premium_amount,
b.payment_method,
b.Payment_date,
b.Policy_type,
c.Claim_id, 
c.Claim_type,
c.Claim_status,
c.Claim_amount 
from [dbo.].[Insurance_Customer] a 
join [dbo.].[Insurance_Premium] b on a.Customer_ID = b.Customer_id
join [dbo.].[Insurance_Claims] c on a.Customer_id = c.Customer_id and b.Customer_id = c.Customer_id;
